Light.name: Padded Vine Armor
Light.description: Light armor made from interwoven vines, offering basic protection.

Light.name: Leather Berry Armor
Light.description: Armor crafted from toughened berry skins, flexible yet sturdy.

Light.name: Studded Citrus Leather
Light.description: Leather armor reinforced with hardened citrus peels for extra resilience.

Light.name: Chain Shirt of Sprouting Links
Light.description: A chain shirt with links resembling sprouting seeds, light and durable.

Medium.name: Hide Armor of the Forest Beast
Medium.description: Armor made from the hide of forest creatures, offering good protection.

Medium.name: Scale Mail of the Dragonfruit
Medium.description: Scale mail with scales resembling the tough skin of a dragonfruit.

Medium.name: Chainmail of the Entwined Vines
Medium.description: Strong chainmail, each link like the entwined vines of a robust plant.

Medium.name: Breastplate of the Ironbark
Medium.description: A breastplate as sturdy as ironbark, offering solid protection.

Heavy.name: Splint Mail of the Thorned Guardian
Heavy.description: Heavy armor with splints sharp as thorns, intimidating and protective.

Heavy.name: Banded Mail of the Rind Warrior
Heavy.description: Banded mail crafted from hardened rinds, tough and imposing.

Heavy.name: Half-Plate of the Orchard Knight
Heavy.description: Half-plate armor adorned with motifs of fruits and leaves, robust and elegant.

Heavy.name: Full Plate of the Grove Champion
Heavy.description: Magnificent full plate armor, embodying the strength and majesty of the grove.

Shields.name: Buckler of the Quick Vine
Shields.description: A small, quick-to-deploy buckler, as agile as a vine in the wind.

Shields.name: Light Wooden Shield of the Sapling
Shields.description: A light shield made from the wood of a young sapling, easy to handle.

Shields.name: Light Steel Shield of the Ironleaf
Shields.description: A light but sturdy shield, made from steel as tough as ironleaf.

Shields.name: Heavy Wooden Shield of the Ancient Oak
Shields.description: A heavy shield made from the wood of an ancient oak, offering solid defense.

Shields.name: Heavy Steel Shield of the Fortress Fruit
Shields.description: A heavy steel shield, as impenetrable as the shell of a fortress fruit.

Shields.name: Tower Shield of the Great Tree
Shields.description: A towering shield, offering extensive protection, like the great trees of the forest.
